title: Reserve
description: A reserve item available for purchase in the store

description.description: Reserve item description (multiline text, can be empty)

isCustom.description: Whether this is a custom item (true) or default/legacy item (false)

notes: Legacy reserves from reserves.json should have isCustom: false
Custom items added by admins should have isCustom: true
Rank 1 = basic/common, Rank 2 = advanced/uncommon, Rank 3 = elite/rare
